doc: The precpu stats is the CPU statistic of the previous read, and is used to calculate the CPU usage percentage. It is not an exact copy of the cpu_stats field.

mappings.description: Total CPU time consumed in nanoseconds
mappings.doc: Total CPU time consumed by the container, in nanoseconds.

mappings.description: Total CPU time (in nanoseconds) consumed per core
mappings.doc: This field is Linux-specific when using cgroups v1.

mappings.description: Time (in nanoseconds) spent by tasks of the cgroup in kernel mode
mappings.doc: CPU time spent in kernel mode by the container's tasks, in nanoseconds.

mappings.description: Time (in nanoseconds) spent by tasks of the cgroup in user mode
Number of periods with throttling active.
Number of periods when the container hit its throttling limit.
Aggregated time (in nanoseconds) the container was throttled for.
